clusterList.phrase: i have so much passion for this type of racing i've never done something in racing that i've enjoyed so much i think that's what is helping me succeed
i haven't raced since the last day of the tour of italy and it'll be good to get back into action
i'm looking forward to going back to the city the people are very nice and we had a great turnout for the race i think it was close to 70 000 people there to watch the napa auto parts 200
as for the trucks i am really looking forward to that i have never run a truck race so it should be fun heck my brother jarit has run more than me but it's going to be a good time
i've won big races before but this one has some extra special meaning because this place is so close to pittsburgh it's cool to finally win a big race out in this area
i'll race to to the car
i'm glad to be going back to pocono raceway for a second time in a cup car
i think we both like racing there and have had some success at the track before
i'd expressed an interest in working with mosport to organize a fun event in the days leading up to the race
i haven't been training too hard just doing local races and waiting for the team to do some big races
was i really still passionate about racing now they see that i am really working hard on that
i love challenges and i love racing
i've always wanted to win one of the big races at the stadium and especially one of the tour races
i enjoy racing at the stadium

it's a blast running a modified car there if the right sponsor came along we'd run there more on the points side of it it can be an eventful night you always worry a little bit about running the tour race there
i'm going to try to finish out the year at sharon speedway and at lernerville
